title: Why do people have such a strong dislike for grunge music? - Quora

response.answer_text: Maybe it’s the name? Would you go on a date with a woman called Smerfluck Humpletraff? Maybe some people just hear the word ‘Grunge’ as a really ugly word which they hate, and then when they hear the music this determines their reaction to it. Or they may just listen to it without any feeling about the name, but find it strongly offensive to their ears. Not everyone likes everything.

Don’t know who these people are but I’m sorry the charts 25 years ago were much better for having grunge in them now the heaviest band in hot 100 is Imagine Dragons lol so would be great though have an era like that again!
